        public Pixel pixelAt(ImageX image,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        Returns and validates the Pixel at the specified coordinate. If the Pixel is invalid, value mirror returned.

      • pixelAt

        public PixelDouble pixelAt(ImageDouble image,
                           int x,
                           int y)
        Returns and validates the PixelDouble at the specified coordinate. Original Pixel is converted to PixelDouble. If the Pixel is invalid, value mirror returned.
        Specified by:
        pixelAt in class PaddingStrategy
        Parameters:
        image - source ImageDouble
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        the validated PixelDouble value at the specified coordinates
